ads.name: Gola AI
ads.title: Let AI help you with your goals
ads.description: Achieve your goals with Gola and get motivation from an AI-powered advice generator.

ads.name: Volo
ads.title: Track your Kitesurfing on Apple Watch
ads.description: Volo is a kitesurfing workout app for watchOS and iOS that lets you track jumps and save the sessions into Fitness.

ads.name: Gola
ads.title: Stay on top of your goals
ads.description: Gola is a beautiful app for iOS and watchOS to help you track your bigger yearly goals and not only offers reminders but also fun little widgets.

ads.name: Petey
ads.title: Have fun with ChatGPT
ads.description: Meet Petey, the AI assistant app for the iPhone & Apple Watch! With this app, you can now talk with ChatGPT right on the go.

ads.name: Today
ads.title: Today, track your day
ads.description: Set goals, track your day. Today.
